citations.narrative:
In the indoor kennel area one of the plastic water receptacle is excessively chewed along the rim by the dogs who can
access this area from the exercise yard. The water receptacle with the chewed edges has dirt and grime embedded into
the plastic and does not allow it to be properly cleaned and sanitized. All water receptacles must be kept clean and
sanitized. Chewed buckets should be repaired or replaced to allow for surfaces to be properly sanitized.
To be corrected by: January 15, 2022
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.10(c) 
   
Watering 
In the indoor kennel area one of the plastic water receptacle is excessively chewed along the rim by the dogs who can 
access this area from the exercise yard.  The water receptacle with the chewed edges has dirt and grime embedded into 
the plastic and does not allow it to be properly cleaned and sanitized.  All water receptacles must be kept clean and 
sanitized.  Chewed buckets should be repaired or replaced to allow for surfaces to be properly sanitized. 
To be corrected by:  January 15, 2022 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
